0.9.name: wordpress/user-activity
0.9.description:
Get an overview over how active your users has been during a specified time period. This plugin will list all the users, the number of posts/pages they have created and when their latest post was created.

You can sort all the columns, filter by post type and search for a specific user name.

Note: This plugin uses the WP_List_Table, even though it is marked as @access private in WordPress core.
